original_text: There is a man in your kingdom who has the spirit of the holy gods in him. When your father was alive, this man showed that he was very wise, like the gods. He could understand secret things. Your father, Nebuchadnezzar, made him the leader of all the magicians, wise men, enchanters and diviners.
korean_text: 왕의 나라에 거룩한 신들의 영이 있는 사람이 있으니 곧 왕의 부친 때에 있던 자로서 명철과 총명과 지혜가 신들의 지혜와 같은 자니이다 왕의 부친 느부갓네살 왕이 그를 세워 박수와 술객과 갈대아 술사와 점쟁이의 어른을 삼으셨으니

sentences.original_text: There is a man in your kingdom
who has the spirit of the holy gods in him
this man showed that he was very wise
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람이 매우 지혜롭다는 것을 보여주었습니다
그는 비밀스러운 것들을 이해할 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: made him the leader of all the magicians
